english: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?
Did He not frustrate their scheme?
For He sent against them flocks of birds
that pelted them with stones of baked clay
leaving them like chewed up straw.
arabic1: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
arabic2: الم تر كيف فعل ربك باصحاب الفيل
